spec.name: Garage Allal Market
spec.description: Garage Allal Market is a well-known local marketplace in Casablanca, often operating as a large informal or covered market. It is particularly famous as a 'joutiya' (flea market or bazaar for second-hand and low-cost goods). Markets like this are vibrant, essential components of the city's local economy, providing a wide array of affordable items, from used clothing and electronics to small household wares. It is a bustling cultural and commercial experience in the Ben Msik area.
